thread.title: Deborah Blazys
thread.title_full: Enchanting Travels reviewed by Deborah Blazys

author: Deborah Blazys
title: Deborah Blazys
text: Enchanting Travels was a very user friendly agency, helping to coordinate our trip to India. Communication was seamless, itinerary was great, and they were very flexible to our constant changes. We were able to see the most in the shortest period of time, while still experiencing India as a culture, a people, a gastronomic delight, a wedding venue.
